keyMoments.title: Nami's Declaration of Loyalty to Her Crew
keyMoments.description: Nami declares to Enel that without her friends, there is nothing she wants. She expresses her desire to continue sailing with the Straw Hat crew above all else, including safety and material wealth.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the deep bonds within the crew and Nami's complete transformation from her Arlong Park characterization. Shows the crew's importance to each member.

keyMoments.title: Sanji and Usopp's Daring Rescue Attempt
keyMoments.description: Despite severe injuries, Sanji and Usopp launch a rescue mission to save Nami from the flying Ark Maxim, using Usopp's grappling device to reach the ship.
keyMoments.significance: Exemplifies the crew's unwavering dedication to protecting each other, even at great personal risk. Shows they will attempt the impossible for their nakama.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Falls from Battle
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy falls from the Ark Maxim after being trapped in Enel's golden ball, seemingly defeated and removed from the climactic battle.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a crisis situation that forces other crew members to step up and continue the fight without their captain.
